meanings.definition: Relating to the study of aquatic life.
meanings.sent1: The hydrobiological research team discovered new species in the river.
meanings.sent2: Scientists use hydrobiological methods to understand underwater ecosystems.
meanings.sent3: The hydrobiological expedition found a fish wearing a tiny lab coat.
meanings.sent4: Her hydrobiological knowledge flowed like a river, nourishing her understanding.
meanings.sent5: The hydrobiological field trip was like diving into a living textbook.

meanings.definition: Involving the biology of water environments.
meanings.sent1: The hydrobiological survey revealed the health of the lake ecosystem.
meanings.sent2: Researchers study hydrobiological processes to protect marine life.
meanings.sent3: The hydrobiological experiment accidentally turned the lab into an aquarium.
meanings.sent4: His hydrobiological expertise was a fountain of knowledge in the field.
meanings.sent5: The hydrobiological investigation painted a vivid picture of underwater habitats.
